summary: Beethoven, the St. Bernard dog, becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dognapped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate.

keywords: dog movie|saint bernard dog|good versus evil|evil woman|boy and his dog
title: Beethoven 2: La familia crece
